WHO RECOMMENDATIONS ON POSTNATAL CARE OF THE MOTHER AND NEWBORN
Three studies, all from LMICs, evaluated the effect of exclusive versus partial breastfeeding 
on diarrhoea morbidity (72, 73, 76). The quality of evidence was graded as low. Exclusively
